name: peppermint (can be played in browser)
description:
use arrows to avoid hitting the peppermints, you can also eat the peppermints to increase the score multiplier, to do that press the space button once so that the peppermint goes inside the open mouth then press it again when you think the closed mouth would be above the peppermint.

for mobile users, press on the side of the screen you would like to move to (left/right), press anywhere on the bottom part of the screen (under the mouth) to move back, and press on the mouth to open/close it.
